articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Newly-Built Combined Fishing-tackle Factory of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Newly-Built Combined Fishing-tackle Factory of KPA
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the newly-built combined fishing-tackle factory under the KPA.
					 Enjoying a panoramic view of the factory, he said it looks nice as it has a high level of culture. He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the KPA successfully built it in a grand style under a long-term plan.
					
					 Going round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the factory, he stressed that the factory should minutely organize the ideological education for giving fullest play to its employees' mental power and dynamically wage a hot emulation and thus successfully  operate the important post directly linked with the work for  improving the diet of the service personnel and people, the armory-like establishment on the fishing front by achieving signal successes in production. 
					
					 He went round the combined control room, sample room, net-production shop, rope-production shop, float production shop and others to learn in detail about the level of its technical equipment, production and quality of products.
					
					  As the factory is fully equipped with such equipment as modern net-weaver, winder and shaper, the level of its technical equipment and production capacity has been remarkably increased and a sea of machines has appeared, he noted.
					
					 He said he was pleased that the factory successfully put an integrated production system on a high scientific and IT basis by pooling efforts with scientists and technicians, the system whereby it can seek the most reasonable production method suited to the production environment, and installed modern machines of Korean style.
					
					 The factory has an important duty to perform, he noted, indicating the tasks facing it.
					
					 Noting that it became possible for the factory to massively produce and sufficiently supply varieties of fishing tackle not only to specialized fishery stations but also to sideline fishing boats of KPA sub-units stationed in coastal areas, he said with pleasure that the factory is an icon factory, a valuable asset and a big base for the generations to come as it can greatly contribute to developing the fishing industry of the country.
					
					 He had a photo taken with the officials and employees of the factory.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik and So Hong Chan.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Moroccan King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Moroccan King
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Mohamed â…¥, king of Morocco, on its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, the message wished the king greater success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK High-level Delegation Leaves for Olympic Games
articles.content:
DPRK High-level Delegation Leaves for Olympic Games
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A DPRK high-level delegation headed by Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, left here Saturday to participate in the 31st Olympic Games to be held in Rio de Janeiro.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho returned home on Saturday after taking part in the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum held in Laos.

articles.title: Congratulations to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Mongolia
articles.content:
Congratulations to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Mongolia
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a congratulatory message to Ts. Munkh-Orgil upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Mongolia on July 28.
					 The message expressed belief that the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations with a long history and tradition would grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries and wished the minister success in his work.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Egyptian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Egyptian President
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, president of the Arab Republic of Egypt, on Friday.
					 The president said he was very pleased to extend his heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 He wished the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and affirmed the will to make positive efforts to develop cooperation between the two countries in all fields of mutual concern.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Japan-Korea Friendship Linking with Juche headed by Takashi Koiwai, vice-chairman of the Japan Matsumoto Citizens Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Japan-Korea Friendship Linking with Juche visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday.
					 Members of the delegation laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A Japan-DPRK friendship educational interchange delegation led by Mamoru Sonobe, vice-chairman of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Women Play Key Role in Light Industrial Sector of DPRK
articles.content:
Women Play Key Role in Light Industrial Sector of DPRK
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Women workers in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are playing a significant role in a drive to build a thriving nation.
					In this regard, KCNA had an interview with Kim Kyong Ok, director of the Ministry of Light Industry, and women innovators, with the anniversary of the Law on Sex Equality promulgated on July 30, Juche 35 (1946) as an occasion.
					
					The promulgation of the law made it possible for the women to enjoy the rights equal to the men's and play a role in creation and construction as much as the men do, Kim said, adding:
					
					Many workers in the light industry have already finished their production assignments for this year and most of them are women.
					
					Han Myong Hui, a worker at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill who has over-fulfilled her three-year production plan, said:
					
					We, women workers, too, play a big role in building a powerful nation, together with men workers.
					
					Several hundred workers of our mill have already topped their yearly assignments. The mill will witness more women innovators who have carried out their three-year or two-year production assignments in the on-going 200-day campaign.
					
					Such innovation is effected by women employees at Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, Hamhung Woolen Mill, Pakchon and Nyongbyon silk mills, Wonsan Shoes Factory and other light industrial establishments across the country.

articles.title: Rangnang Ponghwa Garment Factory
articles.content:
Rangnang Ponghwa Garment Factory
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Women of the DPRK greet the 70th anniversary of the Law on Sex Equality with great labor achievements. 
					 Among them are employees of the Rangnang Ponghwa Garment Factory. 
					
					 In this regard, Pak Chol Nam, manager of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 Women employees of the factory are enjoying a worthwhile life and working pleasantly at modern workshops with the same social position and rights as the men's.
					
					 In recent years, we have kept production going on a high level by introducing new technologies into production and carried out management well, while modernizing production processes. 
					
					 "Pongsonhwa"-trademarked products of the factory are getting popular among women for their diversity in style, color and trimmings and good quality.
					
					 When visiting the factory in May Juche 100 (2011), leader Kim Jong Il highly appreciated its employees for mass-producing quality garments.

articles.title: DPRK Women Enjoy Worthwhile Life
articles.content:
DPRK Women Enjoy Worthwhile Life
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 70th anniversary of the promulgation of the Law on Sex Equality in the DPRK. President Kim Il Sung promulgated the "Law on Sex Equality in North Korea" on July 30, Juche 35 (1946).
					 On the anniversary, all the women of the country pay their deep respects to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who provided them with all rights and high dignity and heartfelt thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is cultivating the flower garden of respect for the women with his loving care.
					
					 Over the past 70 years after the birth of the law, they have led a worthwhile life under the care of the peerlessly great persons, exercising their rights as masters of the country to the full.
					
					 Ordinary women were elected deputies to the state power organs at all levels and many women became competent government officials, heroes, professors and people's actresses, artists and sportspersons, pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot.
					
					 Their social position and role were enhanced in the Songun (military-first) era.
					
					 Today the women in the DPRK are playing an important role in military, political, economic, cultural, scientific and other spheres of society.
					
					 Many of them have become models of the times to be loved by all the people. Among them are a peasant Pak Ok Hui, a weaver Mun Kang Sun, world marathon queen Jong Song Ok and world women's judo star Kye Sun Hui.

articles.title: Susan Rice's China Visit Termed Clumsy and Mean Trip
articles.content:
Susan Rice's China Visit Termed Clumsy and Mean Trip
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A reporter of KCNA Saturday released the following article titled "Clumsy and mean trip":
					 These days the U.S. media have field day about the China junket of Susan Rice, special assistant to the U.S. president for national security.
					
					 The White House said in a statement of a spokesperson for the National Security Council that both sides reached a consensus of view that bilateral cooperation is at an unprecedentedly high level and discussed the issue of narrowing down the differences in a constructive manner.
					
					 Rice reeled off a litany of rhetoric at the talks, meetings and other diplomatic channels that the U.S.-China relations are the most important bilateral ties in the present world, success in China is in conformity with the interests of the U.S. and it is its stand to spur the steady and stable development of the U.S.-China relations of cooperation.
					
					 This is nothing but a poor gesture to soothe China after the China-U.S. relations got noticeably chilly these days due to the U.S. decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea and its interference in the issue of the South China Sea.
					
					 It was by no means accidental coincidence that Rice flew into Beijing when U.S. Secretary of State Kerry busied himself with forming an anti-China coalition over the South China Sea with the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum as a momentum.
					
					 It is an invariable strategy of the U.S. to contain the big powers in Asia-Pacific such as China and dominate the world.
					
					 The U.S. massively hurled its naval forces into the waters of the South China Sea, impertinently meddling in its issue and made public the decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea. It is quite natural that those moves of the U.S. heightened China's vigilance against them.
					
					 Rice's recent visit to China was a clumsy and mean one aimed to calm down China whose nerves were rattled by the U.S. interference in the issue of the South China Sea and its decision on THAAD deployment and conceal the contradiction between the U.S. and China.
					
					 Contrary to the U.S. statement, China reiterated its existing stance on the issue of the South China Sea and THAAD deployment, warned the U.S. of its tendency towards regional hegemony and moves to escalate the military tension and clarified the stand to strongly react to them.
					
					 In the final analysis, Rice's China visit ended in "sightseeing tour".
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to realize that its trite diplomacy will get it nowhere as it pursues hegemony as means of its existence.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Park Geun Hye Group
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea hardly managing its own family affairs acts recklessly even abroad, being unaware of where it stands, only to be detested by others.
					 During the recent ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum, Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, kowtowed to the U.S. taking issue with the DPRK over its nuclear deterrence for self-defense, only to become a laughing stock.
					
					 At a time when the danger of a new Cold War is increasing on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia due to the decision on THAAD deployment in south Korea and the neighboring countries are getting highly vigilant against this, he acted a spokesman for his master, blustering that "THAAD is a defense means for coping with the threat form North Korea and is never targeted against the third country."
					
					 Far from answering the question about the issue of the retraction of the decision on THAAD deployment the neighboring countries are concerned about, he asked them to "keep cooperation to send resolute signal to North Korea that its nuclear development cannot be tolerated" and claimed that "if it continues provocation, it will be made to pay dearly for it." He went the lengths of trying to create impression that south Korea would play a certain role in Northeast Asia where the scramble for hegemony is getting serious.
					
					 Irony is that though the south Korean puppet forces worked heart and soul with such base acts, they got cold shoulder from neighboring countries, far from getting recognition.
					
					 Conveying the news, even media ridiculed Yun Pyong Se as one who was little different from a man in a deck as he was queried what step south Korea is going to take as regards the demand of the retraction of the decision on THAAD deployment and whether south Korea can declare the decision null and void, being told that south Korea would be well advised to sincerely react to the just and reasonable concern of China and ponder over it. This is the inescapable fate of the stooge.
					
					 THAAD deployment in south Korea has long been pushed forward as demanded by its master whether it is wanted by the south Korean puppet forces or not. As residents in Songju County claim, preparations such as the laying of electric wires have been made in the area long before the decision on THAAD deployment was announced.
					
					 The delayed announcement was just deception.
					
					 As seen above, "diplomacy" pursued by the puppet regime which talked much about dichotomy whereby it depends on the U.S. for "security" and attaches importance on China for economy is bound to end in failure.
					
					 It is too natural that even media of south Korea, commenting on the "diplomacy", said that there are feelings of crisis that south Korea-China relations plunged into a quagmire after ten months of "the Tiananmen platform diplomacy" pursued by Park Geun Hye and that "northern diplomacy" which has been cemented since 1990 seems to have been intercepted first by THAAD.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Call upon Korean Women to Display Dignity and Honor in Songun Era
articles.content:
Papers Editorially Call upon Korean Women to Display Dignity and Honor in Songun Era
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Newspapers here dedicate editorials to the 70th anniversary of the publication of the Law on Sex Equality by President Kim Il Sung on July 30, Juche 35 (1946).
					 The seven decades since the publication of the Law on Sex Equality are the proud history in which the dignity and position of Korean women have been put on the highest stage under the leadership of the great leaders and great party and in which examples of building a rich and powerful country have been created by patriotic efforts, enthusiasm and wisdom of the Korean women and other people, Rodong Sinmun says in an editorial.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The President made sure that the Korean women increased their role in the annals of the revolution including the periods of building a new country, the Fatherland Liberation War, the postwar rehabilitation and construction and great Chollima upswing, and that social conditions were fully provided for them. Thanks to his warm care the Korean women, who had just been confined to families only, emerged as mistresses of the times.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to fully guarantee rights and dignity of the excellent Korean women trained by the President and let them advance along the road of revolution and patriotism, following the Party.
					
					 The Korean women's revolutionary enthusiasm, working fever and patriotism are erupting like a volcano in the new century of Juche.
					
					 So great is the trust and expectation put by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in the Korean women now when the 200-day campaign of loyalty is being waged to significantly adorn this year that witnessed the 7th Congress of the WPK as golden days of the Korean revolution.
					
					 All the women should fulfill the mission and duty as women revolutionaries in the Songun era for the Party and revolution, era and history in the ongoing general advance.
					
					 Minju Joson also calls upon all the Korean women to get united around supreme leader Kim Jong Un in single mind and fully display the dignity and honor as Korean women in the great Mallima era.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Demands Retraction of South Korea-U.S. SOFA
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Demands Retraction of South Korea-U.S. SOFA
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article demands the withdrawal of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, cause of all misfortune, from south Korea on the lapse of 50 years since the conclusion of the south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA).
					 The south Koreans of all social strata are struggling in demand of the retraction of the SOFA in south Korea, the paper says, and continues:
					
					 This is quite natural as the SOFA is not only an aggression document which grants the U.S. imperialists legal guarantee for military presence in south Korea but a disgraceful document which infringes upon the dignity and interests of the south Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces have committed shuddering crimes such as murder, violence, rape and environmental degradation under the protection of the unequal SOFA, thereby inflicting insults, misfortune and sacrifice on the south Koreans.
					
					 The projected deployment of THAAD pursued by the Park Geun Hye group that is now wreaking havoc with the whole of south Korea is by no means unrelated to the unequal SOFA.
					
					 The south Korean people can not live at ease even a moment as long as the U.S. imperialist aggression forces station in south Korea and the shackling and unequal "agreements" such as the SOFA exist--this is a bitter lesson of history.
					
					 The south Korean people are called upon to turn out in the anti-U.S. struggle, scrap the modern-day "slavery document" which brings misfortune, disgrace and death to them and drive the U.S. imperialist aggression forces out of south Korea as soon as possible.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Ambition for "Having North Abandon Its Nukes" Accused
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' Ambition for "Having North Abandon Its Nukes" Accused
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, addressing the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum held in Laos recently, termed the DPRK's step for bolstering up its military capabilities for self-defense a "provocation" and blustered that "it is necessary to send concerted and strong message to end an evil cycle of provocation and threat." During the meeting he was closeted with his U.S. and Japanese masters at which he cried out for "intensified cooperation in denuclearizing the north" and "resolution on pressurizing the north." He went the lengths of visiting this or that person to make mischief to hurt the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary ridicules it as a pitiful wriggling to keep cooperation in putting pressure on the DPRK that has faced bankruptcy.
					
					 As recognized at home and abroad, it is none other than the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces that disturb peace and stability on the Korean peninsula through their ceaseless provocations against the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. "six strategic assets" massively introduced on the Korean peninsula and projected THAAD deployment in south Korea are an undisguised military threat to the DPRK and a grave provocation escalating the tension in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Lurking behind "provocation" and "threat" touted by Yun is an aim to shift the blame for the tension on the peninsula on to the DPRK, further intensify cooperation with outside forces in denuclearizing the DPRK and thus realize the ambition for "having the north abandon its nukes."
					
					 This fully revealed once again the ugly colors of Yun as a puppet of the U.S.
					
					 He eagerly begged for "intensified cooperation to denuclearize the north" in disregard of the nature of the international meeting and object only to invite disgrace and cold treatment.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group should be aware of its pitiful plight, first of all.

articles.title: S. Korean Inhabitants Reject "Saenuri Party's" Deceptive Proposal
articles.content:
S. Korean Inhabitants Reject "Saenuri Party's" Deceptive Proposal
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Inhabitants of Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea on July 26 turned down the deceptive proposal made by the gentries of the "Saenuri Party" for the deployment of THAAD, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Chamsesang.
					 That day the floor leader of the party appeared in Songju leading a delegation and held a round-table conversation with representatives of inhabitants at the county office over the issue of forming a council of the Ministry of Defense, the "Saenuri Party", North Kyongsang Province and the Songju Committee for Checking THAAD Deployment.
					
					 The co-chairman of the committee strongly urged the party to retract the plan for THAAD deployment.
					
					 Meanwhile, county inhabitants held a funeral ceremony of the party outside the county office.

articles.title: S. Korean Christians Stage Actions for Peace Treaty
articles.content:
S. Korean Christians Stage Actions for Peace Treaty 
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Members of the south Korean Council of Christian Churches have carried on the struggle for peace on the Korean peninsula across the U.S. including Log Angeles since July 18.
					 They held a meeting with the Korean religionists in the U.S. in Chicago on July 23.
					
					 The speakers said that the conclusion of a peace treaty would be the first step for achieving the peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. has conducted military exercises in south Korea under various codenames such as "beheading operation", they called on all Koreans not to take a fence-sitting approach towards the tense situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Co-existence of the two systems in the south and the north of Korea is the way of achieving peaceful renunciation, they added.
					
					 They signed a written petition urging the U.S. authorities to come out for the conclusion of the peace accord.

articles.title: Resignation of Defense Minister of S. Korea Called for
articles.content:
Resignation of Defense Minister of S. Korea Called for
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the Ministry of Defense on July 26 in demand of the resignation of puppet Defense Minister Han Min Gu, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 The speakers accused Han of attaching more importance to the stand and interests of the U.S. while taking the lead in deploying THAAD.
					
					 They recalled Han's irresponsible remarks that the THAAD deployment was decided at the "National Assembly" session on July 20 at the approval of the U.S.
					
					 They urged him to resign as he has no qualifications as minister.
					
					 A press release was read out there.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Announce Plan for Ulji War Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Announce Plan for Ulji War Drill
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet warmongers plan Ulji war drill across south Korea from August 22 to 25, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 They blustered that the Ulji drill this year would aim at expanding and strengthening the training under the simulated condition of an actual battle to cope with the non-existent "cyber terror from north" and "GPS wave disturbance."
					
					 It was reported that more than 480,000 persons of 4,000 odd organs including administrational and public bodies of cities, counties and districts would take part in the drill.
					
					 In particular, they are going to mobilize civilian ships and planes in the drill to cope with "GPS wave disturbance" for the first time.

articles.title: Anniversary of War Victory Observed in Serbia, Hungary
articles.content:
Anniversary of War Victory Observed in Serbia, Hungary
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Serbia and a lecture and film show in Hungary on July 25 on the 63rd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia said:
					
					 The Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, for the first time in history and won a great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander and brilliant strategist, wisely led the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to honorably defend the sovereignty and independence of the country.
					
					 The victorious tradition the DPRK established by beating the U.S. is being carried forward by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party in a lecture praised the President for leading the war to victory. He went on:
					
					 The Korean people will surely build a powerful socialist country thanks to Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Korean film laying bare the aggressive nature of the U.S. imperialists was shown.

articles.title: Egyptian Newspaper Observes Anniversary of War Victory
articles.content:
Egyptian Newspaper Observes Anniversary of War Victory
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Egyptian newspaper Al Akhbar Almassay carried an article titled "Great victory of Korean people" on July 26 on the 63rd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Korean people mark the 63rd anniversary of their victory in the Fatherland Liberation War on July 27 this year, the article said, and continued:
					
					 It was a historic event unheard-of in the world history of wars that the two-year-old DPRK brought to its knees the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world.
					
					 The Korean people's great victory in the Korean war would be unthinkable without the rare stratagem and superb commandership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The U.S., however, is rendering the situation on the Korean peninsula extremely tense by reinforcing huge troops for aggression, far from drawing a lesson from its defeat in the Korean war.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, outstanding brilliant commander, the DPRK has joined the front rank of nuclear weapons states and become a powerful country capable of beating back any aggressors.
					
					 The DPRK will emerge ever-victorious thanks to the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: U.S. Body Opposes THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Body Opposes THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Veterans' Organization for Peace released a statement on July 23 to voice opposition to the U.S. and the south Korean regime's decision to deploy THAAD.
					The statement said the U.S. and the south Korean regime are justifying the decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea under the pretext of "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK but its main purpose is to neutralize the military potentials of Russia and China and dominate the region, not to defend south Korea.
					
					Recalling the claim made by a U.S. institute that THAAD to be deployed in south Korea would be ineffective in intercepting medium-range missiles of the DPRK, the statement said the south Korean regime is in a position to pay a huge amount of money for the deployment of THAAD which is of no help to its self-defence.
					
					The decision to deploy THAAD will only screw up military tension on the Korean peninsula and in the region as it is a clear provocation against the DPRK and its neighboring countries, and will spark a new arms race, it added.

articles.title: VOA on No-THAAD Struggle of S. Koreans
articles.content:
VOA on No-THAAD Struggle of S. Koreans
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- VOA introduced the on-going No-THAAD struggle of south Korean people on July 21.
					 Noting that residents of Songju  County, North Kyongsang Province chosen as a site for THAAD staged actions in Seoul on July 21 in protest against the regime's decision to deploy it that threatens their existence, the broadcasting service said:
					
					 Peace activists also held a press conference in Seoul to express objection to THAAD deployment.
					
					 Opposition party figures are demanding the retraction of the THAAD deployment plan, noting it is nothing beneficial to south Korea.
					
					 The residents of the county are concerned about its strong electromagnetic wave which is supposed to have big impact on their health and agricultural production.
					
					 They are hardly repressing anger at the projected THAAD deployment.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Slam U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Military Provocation
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Slam U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Military Provocation 
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on July 26 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces for becoming evermore undisguised in their military provocation in the West Sea of Korea. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces have made desperate efforts for the massive arms buildup around the five islets in the West Sea of Korea and the adventurous military provocation on the guard line in sea waters of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 They are working hard to commit the military provocation in acute waters to induce the KPA's counteraction for self-defense and then denounce it as "provocation" and "threat".
					
					 Their reckless saber-rattling will lead to the second Korean war.
					
					 If a war breaks out, aggressors will not be safe.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces had better not forget the lesson of the last Korean war.
					
					 We fully support all steps taken by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Slovenian Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Slovenian Body
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Resolutely Repel the U.S. Imperialists' Armed Invasion" was posted by the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association on its website on July 25 on the 63rd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The work, published on July 8, Juche 39 (1950), indicates the tasks for mounting deadly strike at the U.S. imperialist aggressors.

articles.title: Indian Newspaper Discloses U.S. Real Intention behind "Theory of Threat from North Korea"
articles.content:
Indian Newspaper Discloses U.S. Real Intention behind "Theory of Threat from North Korea"
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The July 28th issue of the Indian newspaper Rising Europe carried an article titled "The U.S. real intention behind 'theory of threat from North Korea'".
					 The newspaper said that the U.S. is aggravating the situation on the Korean peninsula with its large-scale war exercises while describing the DPRK's measures for bolstering up its self-defensive capabilities as "threat".
					
					 It went on:
					
					 We are going to disclose the injustice of the U.S. "theory of threat from North Korea" that the DPRK's measures for bolstering up its self-defensive capabilities threaten world peace and security, and the real intention sought by it through the theory.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the above-said DPRK's measures can neither be "threat" nor "provocation" in light of international law and from realistic viewpoint.
					
					 Firstly, the DPRK's measures are the exercise of the legitimate right to self-defense in full line with the UN Charter and international law.
					
					 Secondly, the DPRK's measures are the legitimate ones for self-defense in view of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the intensity of military threats against it that have lasted for several decades.
					
					 The U.S. real intention in spreading the "theory of threat from North Korea" is to justify its aggression hostile policy toward the DPRK and push forward its rebalancing strategy in Asia-Pacific.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Combinado de Instrumentos de Pesca de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Combinado de Instrumentos de Pesca de EPC
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Combinado de Instrumentos de Pesca del Ejercito Popular de Corea, construido nuevamente.
					Presenciando el panorama de la fabrica, el Presidente Kim Jong Un expreso gran satisfaccion diciendo que la fabrica fue construida de manera perspectiva con el nivel cultural y gran tamano.
					
					Al recorrer la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial, el Presidente subrayo la necesidad de organizar con escrupulosidad la educacion ideologica y avivar el fervor de emulacion para movilizar el poderio espiritual de los empleados para que ellos logren sin cesar grandes exitos productivos en este puesto importante del frente pesquero, relacionado directamente con la mejora del regimen alimentario de los militares y habitantes.
					
					Y recorrio la sala de control general, la de muestras, las brigadas de red, cuerda y boya y otros lugares mientras que estudio en detalles el nivel de equipos tecnicos, el estado de produccion de la fabrica y la calidad de los productos.
					
					Como resultado de que la fabrica fue equipada perfectamente con las maquinas modernas entre otras las tejedoras de red, los aspadores y las de modelar necesarias para la produccion de instrumentos de pesca, se elevo considerablemente el nivel de equipos tecnicos y la capacidad productiva de la fabrica en comparacion con el periodo pasado y se formo un mar de maquinas, dijo.
					
					Se puso satisfecho de que en cooperacion con los cientificos y tecnicos establecieron con excelencia el sistema integral de produccion, cientifizado y informatizado en nivel alto, que permite buscar hasta el remedio productivo mas adecuado al ambiente productivo, e instalaron las maquinas modernas a estilo coreano.
					
					Kim Jong Un dijo que es importante la mision del Combinado de Instrumentos de Pesca del EPC y presento las tareas que le incumben a esta fabrica.
					
					Ahora, el combinado puede producir en gran cantidad y suministrar suficientemente variados instrumentos de pesca necesarios no solo a las empresas pesqueras, sino tambien a la faena secundaria pesquera de las subunidades del EPC estacionadas en las islas y la zona litoral, dijo y senalo con gran alegria que esta fabrica es la riqueza preciosa que pueda hacer un gran aporte al desarrollo de la industria pesquera del pais y la gran base a ser transmitida a las generaciones venideras.
					
					El Presidente se fotografio junto con los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik y So Hong Chan.
